title: Add Colony and GlassFrog examples, trim whitespace
description:
Add two examples to the "Aligning wisdom and influence" section. Both examples, Colony and GlassFrog, operationalize flexible hierarchy through various mechanisms: in Colony's case, through a [dynamic reputation system](https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/61840fafb9a4c433c1470856/639b50406de5d97564644805_whitepaper.pdf), and through GlassFrog's case, through the implementation of overlapping "spheres" of influence. Both examples represent concrete efforts to further the goals of this section.

In addition, some redundant whitespace was removed throughout the chapter.
